text: DELIVERING THE LOCAL PLAN 11.10 Part 4 of the policy seeks to ensure new development promotes, protects, and supports the “everyday economy” which focuses on jobs, opportunities, and the experiences of local people and residents across the borough. 11.11 Part 4(a) looks to promote the provision of affordable workspace across the borough to support the “everyday economy,” particularly local businesses, start-ups, entrepreneurs, and SMEs. 11.12 Part 4(b) seeks to protect and enhance employment-led development, or other strategic CAZ functions and appropriate uses, in the following strategic locations: the Preferred Office Locations Tower Hamlets Local Plan 47 DELIVERING THE LOCAL PLAN
